Articles.Content:
I'm having satellites accelerating to escape velocity when I'm not focused on them. It seems to happen when I time warp, but I'm mot sure. This has happened multiple times, and all the satellites affected originate from the same craft.

Not that the engines are turned off:

This is the orbit after it glitched:

I have BDA continued,  vessel mover, and physics range extender installed. 

Edited October 12, 2018 by a_space_oddity
more details

I'd recommend temporarily removing Vessel Mover and Physics Extender to ensure that they aren't the problem.

Try launching up a new craft and see what happens.It could be some weird krakeny business going on with the original vessel.

I suspect that Physics Extender may be behaving in a slightly enthusiastic manner and probably needs a fresh config.

 

Hope it gets fixed!

 

 

Nice satellite, by the way. I may have to pirate the design...

On 10/13/2018 at 6:44 AM, GearsNSuch said:

I suspect that Physics Extender may be behaving in a slightly enthusiastic manner and probably needs a fresh config.

I was wondering if it might be something with PRE, I’ll reinstall it and see if it fixes the problem.
